mapper.insert: insert into trip_plan( trip_plan_title, trip_plan_content, trip_plan_start_day, trip_plan_arrive_day, member_id ) values ( #{tripPlanTitle}, #{tripPlanContent}, #{tripPlanStartDay}, #{tripPlanArriveDay}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: select * from trip_plan where member_id = #{memberId} order by trip_plan_id desc
select * from trip_day where trip_plan_id = #{tripPlanId} order by trip_day_id
mapper.insert: insert into trip_day( trip_day_day, trip_day_place, trip_day_address, trip_day_date, trip_day_image, trip_plan_id, trip_day_mapx, trip_day_mapy ) values ( #{tripDayDay}, #{tripDayPlace}, #{tripDayAddress}, #{tripDayDate}, #{tripDayImage}, #{tripPlanId}, #{tripDayMapx}, #{tripDayMapy} )
